scripts.p2020: vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name p2020 --dest dist/p2020 src/components/Post2020Graph/index.vue
scripts.p2020Demo: vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name p2020Demo --dest dist/p2020Demo src/main.js
scripts.bv: vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionView --dest dist/aaview src/components/AAView/index.vue
scripts.bf: vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionForm --dest dist/aaform src/components/AAForm/index.vue
scripts.bl: vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionList --dest dist/aalist src/components/AAList/index.vue
scripts.bd: vue-cli-service build  --target lib --formats umd-min --name actionDemo --dest dist/demo src/main.js
scripts.build: yarn bf && yarn bl && yarn bv
